properties.entry: SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM( SELECT BID , BTITLE , FILE_PATH , CHANGE_NAME , PROFILE_PATH , NICKNAME FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER ON (BWRITER=USER_NO) JOIN IMAGE USING(BID) WHERE BTYPE = 1 AND B.STATUS = 'N' AND FILE_LEVEL = 0 AND (SYSDATE - CREATE_DATE) BETWEEN 0 AND 3 ORDER BY B.BCOUNT DESC) A WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 0 AND 4)

SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM( SELECT BID , BTITLE , FILE_PATH , CHANGE_NAME , PROFILE_PATH , NICKNAME FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER ON (BWRITER=USER_NO) JOIN IMAGE USING(BID) WHERE BTYPE = 2 AND B.STATUS = 'N' AND FILE_LEVEL = 0 AND (SYSDATE - CREATE_DATE) BETWEEN 0 AND 3 ORDER BY B.BCOUNT DESC) A WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 0 AND 4)

SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM( SELECT BID , BTITLE , FILE_PATH , CHANGE_NAME , CREATE_DATE , BTYPE , PROFILE_PATH , NICKNAME FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER ON (BWRITER=USER_NO) JOIN IMAGE USING(BID) WHERE B.STATUS = 'N' AND FILE_LEVEL = 0 AND CREATE_DATE - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE ,'yyyy/mm/dd')) BETWEEN 0 AND 1 ORDER BY B.BCOUNT DESC) A WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 0 AND 1)
